articles.title: AFCON 2021: Egypt goalkeeper, Gabaski reveals conversation with Salah about Mane - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: Egypt goalkeeper, Gabaski, has divulged his conversation with Mohamed Salah moments before he saved Sadio Mane's early penalty in the 2021 Africa Cup of Nations Final. Salah was seen speaking with Gabaski as Mane stepped up from 12 yards in the seventh minute…
articles.content:
Egypt goalkeeper, Gabaski, has divulged his conversation with Mohamed Salah moments before he saved Sadio Mane’s early penalty in the 2021 Africa Cup of Nations Final.

articles.title: Ncikazi told to play Mhango or 'go back to Arrows' - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: Erstwhile Orlando Pirates striker Andries “Local is Lekker” Sebola has rebuked the club’s coach Mandla Ncikazi for his recent comments on in-form striker Gabadinho Mhango and his rather bizarre comments regarding the Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon).

articles.title: Investec asks staff to get vaccinated or pay for tests - News24

articles.title: Rhodes University researchers help bring the heart of the Milky Way into focus - Rhodes University
articles.description: The South African Radio Astronomy Observatory (SARAO) has released a new MeerKAT telescope image of the centre of our Galaxy, showing radio emission from the region with unprecedented clarity and depth. The international team behind the work is publishing the…
articles.content: The new MeerKAT image of the Galactic centre region is shown with the Galactic plane running horizontally across the image. Many new and previously-known radio features are evident, including superno… [+6709 chars]

articles.title: US issues travel and security warning to its citizens in Ethiopia - News24
articles.description: In a travel advisory notice, the US Department of State has warned its citizens in Ethiopia that should the situation in the East African country deteriorate further, it will not be able to evacuate them.
articles.content:
• The US says it may not be able to assist its nationals in Ethiopia, particularly outside Addis Ababa.
